author: wsjcom
title: Liberty University Is Right To Invite President Trump
text:
In her review of Adam Laats’s “Fundamentalist U” (Bookshelf, May 7), Naomi Schaefer Riley notes that much has been made of the incongruity of Liberty University’s choice of a thrice-married adulterer with a foul mouth, President Donald Trump, as its commencement speaker in 2017. Liberty’s inviting President Trump to speak was in keeping with the Bible’s recognition that all have sinned and fallen short in this life. Let’s not forget that Jesus was friends with tax collectors and prostitutes; perfect people didn’t need him.
